title: How should I revise for VITEEE Exams? - Quora
tags: Vellore Institute of Technology Engineering Entrance Examination (VITEEE)

response.answer_text: only and only your cbse notes which you took for boards , they even ask theoritical questions from physics from chapter such as optics…….. it is really simple to crack if you do smart work . Dont do many numericals just read theory and write all formulas on a piece of white sheet . “VITEEE DOES NOT REQUIRE HARD WORK IT ONLY REQUIRES SMART WORK” i was 2311 rank in viteee and trust me it was really easy to get such a rank . if you have worked hard for your boards then definitely you will get a good rank. all the best, share your expirence atfer you are done !

Just solve model papers and previous years VITEEE papers available on internet. And practice it online , so that you are used to see the screen for a long time otherwise it would be difficult for you to sit and see towards the monitor continuously for couple of hours. All the very best !!!!
